headline.print_headline: Britain's EU Exit Could Lead to Banking Exodus-Financial Times
headline.main: Britain's EU Exit Could Lead to Banking Exodus-Financial Times

lead_paragraph: Some Wall Street banks are drawing up preliminary plans that include moving some of their London-based operations to Ireland to deal with the possible scenario of Britain leaving the European Union, the Financial Times reported on Sunday, citing people familiar with the situation.
